attributes.description:
At WINGFIELD MOTORS our customer is king!
Before delivery, this vehicle will receive a Multi-point quality inspection before being subjected to an AA DEKRA roadworthiness test.  We will trade in any vehicle on this transaction and ensure you receive a pleasant buying experience.  Finance and Insurance can be arranged from our premises by our highly qualified and experienced staff.  You can be assured of great aftersales service, should this be required.  This vehicle can be delivered country wide at an agreed cost.  Please ask about our optional Mechanical breakdown warranties for your new vehicle.  We also provide optional Service Plans to ensure you do not experience sudden servicing costs.

attributes.agent_name: Motus Ford Diep River Used Cars
attributes.description:
Previous features PLUS
• Multimedia 8” Touchscreen
• SatNav
• Apple CarPlay® /Android AutoTM
• Previous features PLUS
• Automatic AMT Gearbox

Yes, the legendary Renault reliability is backed up across all Kwid models with a 5-year/150 000km warranty and 6-year anti-corrosion warranty.

The Renault Kwid has a 50kW, 1.0-litre 3-cylinder, 12-valve engine. It uses unleaded petrol and has indirect injection. It comes standard with a catalytic converter.

Why Ford Approved
All our vehicles have passed our stringent 160-point check
Our vehicles have a full-service history
None of our vehicles have been registered for more than 5 years old
Our vehicles have a maximum mileage of 120 000km
We get our cars’ mileage readings verified
Our vehicles come with the balance of Manufacturer’s Warranty - or a new warranty
The Balance of the Service Plan and Maintenance Plan is included
We offer Roadside Assistance for 12 months
We accept all trade-ins
We offer test drives on all our used vehicles
